WorkItem.Description: With DavesGlossyControls, if you have a TextBlock with a Hyperlink inline in a ListBoxItem, you are unable to click on it.  The "gloss" Rectangle over the ContentPresenter in the style receives the clicks.  I set IsHitTestVisible="False" on the gloss Rectangle, recompiled, and it works fine.
WorkItem.Summary: ListBoxItem in DavesGlossyControls prevents clicking on Hyperlink inlines
